page.title: 04LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Mr.Parkinson,Chairman of the Parish Council,told us about the letters he receives each month.He gets letters about trees obstructing footpaths,complaints about footpaths from farmers.Letters from people outside the village who want to be buried in Cawthorne graveyard,but only people who were born or have lived in Cawthrone,can be buried there.The council has to decide weather people can have extensions built to their houses.First the person writes to Barnsley Council and they send it to Cawthorne Parish Council who decide whether it will be in keeping with the rest of the houses.The Council also has to make sure that the buses run on time.
